column4: ï»¿can anyone help me adding windows to grub? i tried to add it but when i click windows it just blinks

First of all, are you certain Windows is on the first partition of the first hard drive? Also, between root and makeactive, it is sometimes useful to add savedefault. Oh, and Windows entries generally go outside the automagic list.
but more than anything, we need to be sure you're pointing to the right partition
how can i found out on what hdd is my windows?
Because grub and fdisk's naming schemes parallel each other, if you pastebin the output of sudo fdisk -l, it will be possible to tell.
Yup, that should be 0,0...........Okay, so I suggest moving your Windows entry outside the automagic block and putting savedefault between "root" and "makeactive"
I mean, put the Windows entry after the line that says ### END DEBIAN AUTOMAGIC KERNEL LIST
If it helps, mine looks like this: http://paste.ubuntu.com/47059/
thanks ill soon reboot to check. i also have a kernel problem, do you have any expirence with those?
i will reboot now to check
